titles.title: Keep America Flying Act of 2026
Keep America Flying Act of 2026

A bill making continuing appropriations for essential Federal Aviation Administration and Transportation Security Administration pay and operations in the event of a Federal Government shutdown, and for other purposes.

action.text: Introduced in the Senate. Read the first time. Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under Read the First Time. (Legislative Day October 21, 2025).

calendar.text: Read the second time. Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 205.
